channel.title: S3-Storage on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in S3-Storage on Arrans github.io

item.title: seaweedfs/seaweedfs
item.description: SeaweedFS is a fast distributed storage system for blobs, objects, files, and data lake, for billions of files! Blob store has O(1) disk seek, cloud tiering. Filer supports Cloud Drive, xDC replication, Kubernetes, POSIX FUSE mount, S3 API, S3 Gateway, Hadoop, WebDAV, encryption, Erasure Coding. Enterprise version is at seaweedfs.com.

item.title: mnfst/manifest
item.description: Manifest gives you a complete backend with data, storage, logic and an admin UI so you can ship your prototypes, MVPs and simple web apps fast. ðŸ¦š

item.title: Forceu/Gokapi
item.description: Lightweight selfhosted Firefox Send alternative without public upload. AWS S3 supported.

item.title: okhosting/awesome-storage
item.description: A curated list of storage open source tools. Backups, redundancy, sharing, distribution, encryption, etc.
